data.title: Bangalore Metro Rail Corporation Limited
data.meta_description:
Bangalore Metro Rail Corporation Limited | 9,046 followers on LinkedIn. Namma Metro | Bangalore Metro Rail Corporation Limited (BMRCL), a joint venture of Government of India and Government of Karnataka is a Special Purpose Vehicle entrusted with the responsibility of implementation of Bangalore Metro Rail Project. 
Bangalore Metro, christened as "Namma Metro"‚Äã, not only adds to the beauty of Bangalore skyline, but immensely adds to the comfort level of travel. Besides this, Namma Metro is a major environment friendly addition to the Bangalore City as it significantly contribute to the reduction of carbon emissions.
data.text:
Stay Strong. Love endlessly. Change Lives. Suicide is not a remedy. Reach out to us here if you feel to End there. Unfortunate incident in Namma Metro. Prayers to Family members üôèüèæ. Public you have chance to save people on track by alerting Train operator by hand signal or Pressing Emergency Trip system (ETS) in station. Know the location of ETS in station you Board and De-board. Please create awareness among metro commuters.

After much obstacles in this Project BMRCL came out stronger in bringing Metro Rail to much demand line RV Road to Bommasandra. We BMRCL's System wing and Civil wing are dedicated to public service. Testing started in Yellow line. Revenue service by end of this Year.

BMRCL MD Anjum Parwez, BEML CMD Shantanu Roy & BEML team, N.M Dhoke Director (RSE, O&M) and BMRCL team in the event of awarding Contract of INR.3176.82 cr to BEML Ltd to supply 318 nos. of Rolling Stock with 15years maintenance.
